SELECT e.EXHIBITION_ID , e.EXHIBITION_TITLE ,e.EXHIBITION_START_DATE , e.EXHIBITION_END_DATE , e.EXHIBITION_IMAGE , e.EXHIBITION_LOCATION , r.REVIEW_TITLE , r.REVIEW_CONTENTS , r.REVIEW_DATE , r.REVIEW_STAR_SCORE , r.REVIEW_ID , r.CUSTOMER_ID FROM EXHIBITION_INFO e , REVIEW r
